metadata.name: Top Tipners
metadata.description: Community leaderboard for top TIPN stakers on Base mainnet. Track rankings, view verified identities, and explore the TIPN ecosystem.
metadata.longDescription: Top Tipners is the premier community-built leaderboard showcasing the top 1000 $TIPN token stakers on Base mainnet. Features real-time staking data, Farcaster identity integration, ENS/Basename resolution, and comprehensive search functionality. Built by the community, for the community.

permissions.reason: To display your current TIPN staking position and rank in the leaderboard
To show your Farcaster profile information alongside your staking data
